tests.title: The publicKeyMultibase property represents a Multibase-encoded Multikey expression of a BLS12-381 public key in the G2 group. The encoding of this field is the two-byte prefix 0xeb01 followed by the 96-byte compressed public key data. The 98-byte value is then encoded using base58-btc (z) as the prefix. Any other encodings MUST NOT be allowed.

Any other encodings MUST NOT be allowed.
